website_summaries.verdict: An attractive and all-around quality board, although you’ll be spending extra to pick up accessories such as chalk, erasers, magnets, and a chalk tray.
pros: Very sturdy, with a wooden frame
The magnetic surface in particular works very well
Also available in a variety of smaller sizes
cons: Doesn’t come with a chalk tray or any accessories
Some of these boards are susceptible to warping, either through shipping or extended use

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with one small caveat...
customer_reviews.text: I actually do love these boards - I have two that hang in my mud room over backpack hooks. I love that they're magnetic. All the school papers/calendars/schedules go here. It's perfect. My only issue is that the hanging hooks on the back are only set for a vertical hang. I needed them to hang horizontal. It was very easy to unscrew the hardware with a drill and then reposition them in the way I needed them to be, but since the picture shows the board horizontal I was expecting it to be able to hang that way out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: R. Canty

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my purpose. I collect magnets from all over the world and wanted to showcase them. Did not want to stick them on the side of the refrigerator as it was getting cluttered. I bought the small size and it could fit all my magnets. Will buy one more to add the remaining magnets
customer_reviews.author: Arti Tejusinghani

customer_reviews.title: Frame is wood not particle board
customer_reviews.text: Chalkboard is perfect and was really happy with the frame! It was real wood and I was expecting some cheap fake wood that I couldn’t sand or paint but I did & it turned out perfect!! Also like the pre-attached hooks for hanging
customer_reviews.author: R-N-T

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, beautiful antique/farmhouse look.
customer_reviews.text: Chalkboards exceeded my expectations! It is lightweight, but very well made. The finish is very easy to write on and not at all slick like some of the other chalkboards on the market. I thought for sure that I would have to paint the frame but it's a beautiful muted brown color. The corners are slightly rounded which I love - it matches well with my antique/vintage farmhouse decor. Very highly recommend! The size shown is 11x17.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfTwo

customer_reviews.title: It's not just a great chalkboard!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something pretty to put my new magnetic spice containers on. This is perfect! They look like a framed work of art. My grandson had a blast arranging them in different patterns. I'm sure it's an amazing chalkboard but it's also an amazing spice display. I added two small chains and it's lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Erskine

customer_reviews.title: School Teacher Approved.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality board and it shows. Nothing wrong with the frame it comes with also very nice. I'm impressed with quality of this ; My wife gave this 5 stars. she's a school teacher and uses a black board everyday. Then she said " Hey I want this in my kitchen can you make it match the maple cabinets " So when I'm done Ill post a picture.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Best Chalkboard I have found!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this chalkboard. After using other brands, I have found this board is the easiest to clean. I do not have any lingering streaks or words that remain after a washing. The colors of my chalk markers are vibrant on this board. Easy to mount and a beautiful addition to any home.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: Bad reviews true.  Board is lightweight and cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: After reading mixed reviews I took a chance. Unfortunately the bad reviews are true. The board arrived with bubbles where the thin black material is not attached properly. I thought from the description of the board that this was a solid, heavy duty board. It is very light, cheap frame and cheaper chalk board. When I read "quality," "steel," and "porcelain" it made me think solid, sturdy, authentic. NOPE. I am ordering another one because of the price only and I will get use out of them, but I am sad to say the description is very misleading and they are NOT high quality. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Cherise

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised, not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Cheap sticker veneer over a hard surface. Very light and flimsy feeling. Arrived with 6 total large bubbles under the veneer. Not at all what I expected from the reviews, so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: agiwoff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: I got this chalkboard for my fiancé to hang in our living room. He likes to map out his thoughts on projects he's working on this way. So far, we've only used regular cheap chalk on it (I got the Versachalk markers, but haven't used them yet), and it's super smooth, erases beautifully. You can really tell the difference with the materials. It hasn't been long, but it seems like it won't scratch. Nothing about it looks cheap, so it fits in well with the rest of the room. It's exactly what I was looking for. :)
customer_reviews.author: Aikorulz

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: The black surface is paper-like and was billowed up upon delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality magnetic chalkboard. The wood frame is lovely as well. I'm using it for homeschooling, but it looks great in our dining room. It has sturdy hooks, although I haven't tested them yet. I'm delighted with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ott

customer_reviews.title: Bent!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed that this item was even sent out looking the way it does. It has bubbles and bends and not even flat! I should not have to go through sending it back out because it is literally trash.
customer_reviews.author: Jennings Nichols

customer_reviews.title: It bubbles just like wall paper and leaves a wave on the board
customer_reviews.text: This is not what it says it is, should have known by the price. I am not sure how they can justify this unless they use a porcelain steel paint on the contact paper that is basically put onto a backboard and framed. It bubbles just like wall paper and leaves a wave on the board, so you know it is just paper. Afraid I am going to have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: BusyK

customer_reviews.title: So far we're super pleased with these
customer_reviews.text: So far we're super pleased with these. Like a lot of other customers, we have a stainless steel fridge and didn't want to junk up the sides with memos, pictures, magnets, etc. so we bought this. I can't speak for how the surface holds up to writing on as we only intend to use it as a magnetic board, but it's a really nice piece.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Serves a purpose!
customer_reviews.text: The board is beautiful and matches perfectly for what I have in mind. However, I don't have it up on the wall just yet. It's a bit heavier than I expected. It will be used as a reminder board for myself in my small apartment. I am tired of writing notes on paper and then not paying attention to them because I don't look at them. This will solve the problem!
customer_reviews.author: Farmvic

customer_reviews.title: Good quality chalkboard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chalkboard for household notes in the kitchen. I needed one that is magnetic, which this one is. I especially like this one because the chalkboard itself is flush with the wall on the back. On some chalkboards the frame sticks out farther than the board on back, so when you write it bounces because there's nothing behind it. On this one, though the wall itself supports the board for a firm writing surface.
customer_reviews.author: melissa butler

customer_reviews.title: Could be better quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our youth sports concession stand. It arrived with a few small scratches on the board, not a huge deal. The scratches had to be from the factory, because the packaging was secure. One of the screws was put in incorrectly, which chipped the wood around it, so I had to disassemble it and fix it. Super frustrating considering the cost, but we needed it ASAP and I didn't have time to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Decent but Not Worth the Cost
customer_reviews.text: The board looks great, and holds most magnetic items. However, my chalk markers do not go on smoothly. AT ALL. It takes work to get them to show up and the finish is streaky and faded. I have to pump the chalk marker to get the liquid to run and then “paint” the design with the pen tip. I have a cheap chalkboard that works light years better than this one and the surface is much smoother. Regular chalk works fine on this surface. But this rough surface is terrible for chalk markers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful way to display souvenir magnets
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I no longer buy large souvenirs on our travels. Years ago, we started buying magnets from the various places we visited and displayed them on our refrigerator. Well, that becomes rather messy looking over time. Therefore, I decided to buy a framed magnetic board in order to display these little things and hang in my office. It turned out well and I am reminded on a daily basis of our various adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M. Guess

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Magnetic Chalk Board!
customer_reviews.text: I put it up within an hour of receiving my package. I also purchased a magnetic weekly meal planner and stuck that in the upper left-hand corner. It has the hanging loops on the narrower edge so it hangs vertically not horizontally. You can always unscrew the hooks and reorient them. I didn't need to. I will get a lot of use out of this board and I love that it is also magnetic. Fantastic buy. I am using some fine tipped chalk markers. They erase clean.
customer_reviews.author: B&D

customer_reviews.title: Painted steel, not porcelain
customer_reviews.text: This board is NOT porcelain. I did receive a magnetic board, but it is simply steel painted black. I had hoped it would work out, but it scratched seconds after opening and the coating just flakes off. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: compuparker86

customer_reviews.title: Works great with basic old fashioned chalk
customer_reviews.text: When considering whether or not to switch from a dry-erase board to a chalk board for homeschooling, I researched many types of blackboards. It was important to me to find a well-constructed, generously-sized blackboard that would work great with basic chalk (because I'm tired of using pricey markers that dry out in the middle of a lesson). This board fits the bill! No problems with ghost marks. It cleans up great with a dry cloth, and a moist cloth makes it look like new. Packaging was excellent. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Writes smoothly and erases easily!
customer_reviews.text: I hung this up inside my pantry to leave grocery lists and other notes for myself. I found that two 3M Command strips worked perfectly to hang this up, but allow me to easily remove it and write on a flat surface if I want to. I have been using a liquid chalk pen which writes very smoothly on the surface, and have had no problem erasing with a damp paper towel. I am very pleased with this product and would buy again if the need arose.
customer_reviews.author: MPA

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this magnetic chalkboard. Not only was the shipping lightning fast but it was so well packaged too! The board itself is good quality and the wooden border gives it that vintage patina. So beautiful, and not to mention functional with the dual ability to write with chalk and magnetic. It is the perfect addition to our mid-century-modern home.
customer_reviews.author: hoyasaxa

customer_reviews.title: Will have to do, already threw out box!
customer_reviews.text: Blackboard wipes off clean, & magnet works. Our issues are it was not flat, the board itself. The blackboard part is slightly bulging at a couple of corners on the right side & it is thin & not glued properly to the back & not all the way to the frame. The left corners are ok. Shoddy workmanship. The wooden frame around it, however is nice. Should have trusted reviews I had seen & avoided this.
customer_reviews.author: Manatee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Functional Decor
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great functional decor accent for my kitchen- hung it in a vertical position and I post our weekly menu with chalk markers. The board cleans very easily with warm water or even my homemade glass cleaner. I use both VersaChalk and CraftyCroc brand chalk markers on this board and it takes both nicely. The one thing I wish it came with is the skill of perfect chalk board lettering!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: Great magnetic chalkboard!
customer_reviews.text: Hi! The board came on time and in great condition. Performs well. Just as good as my chalkboard in my classroom I used for 24 years. ( only it was larger of course). Lol! I miss it. But this works fine for my 3 yr old granddaughter! I saved all my teacher made board games that I laminated and put magnets on. 👍 Enjoying teaching my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: So smoooooth
customer_reviews.text: I tried to prime it like you have to with other chalkboards but the board was so smooth it didn’t really need it! The hardware is a little different than I’m used to but I love this board!!
customer_reviews.author: Brit Rayzor

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Durable, sturdy, nice blackboard, like the old-fashioned kind you remember from grade school. I used 3-M command strips to attach it to a freshly painted wall. Came VERY well wrapped with styrofoam, bubble wrap and double boxed to protect it during shipping. Glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: CJG

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm probably better ones to buy.
customer_reviews.text: We have yet to see how this product will work for us. But, right off the bat, after leveling twice and drilling once, I noticed it hung out of level. I had to re-drill the hanging loops on the back so they were level. I thought that was a weird thing to mess up when it was made. The material (used for black board) also does not sit flat on one edge. It is wavy. Improper glue up? See picture
customer_reviews.author: Dutch Swan

customer_reviews.title: Great chalkboard
customer_reviews.text: This chalkboard is awesome and I could use the wet chalk markers on it!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Warweg

customer_reviews.title: great for price, chalk markers work well
customer_reviews.text: chalk markers work well & come off easy with water rather than try to hang evenly with 2 screws. I put something in the middle to hang it by. put some small rubber bumpers on the back to keep it steady. painted the outside to match my paint colors. Lovely addition to our new kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: grahamje

customer_reviews.title: Steel magnetic framed picture holder
customer_reviews.text: purchased for the magnetic aspect... to put some pics of grandsons on... it goes with another framed pic holder. It looks like a chalk board... but it works GREAT as a magnetic picture holder. Magnets stick really well. Feels like it would work with chalk, but I haven't tried that! It has two "hanger" pieces that hang the frame length wise... however I wanted to hang it the wider way - as it is pictured... sooo.. I used some velcro.. easy.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverYOUNGTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: No ghosting from chalk markers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our daughters first day of preschool. It worked great! No annoying ghosting when I erased the chalk markers. Now my daughter is enjoying using it to make her masterpieces. :) I took off one star because it did arrive with a little chip in the upper left corner. It is hardly noticeable. I could have returned it but I waited until the last minute to order it (thank you same day shipping!) and wouldn’t have gotten it back in time for the first day of school.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it. The writing surface is fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hang in my backyard for our corn hole games. I absolutely love it. The writing surface is fabulous, and its really sturdy. I didn't give it 5 starts due to the hanging hooks being crooked on the back. They didnt put the hooks on evenly, and the OCD in me does not like the crooked hang. I'll need to unscrew it and fix it myself. Oh, and a little tray for the chalk would be nice, but I can deal with that. The crooked hooks, no!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee A. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: This is not porcelain steel...this is some kind of wood backing
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for it's porcelain steel quality so I could put outside...it is some kind of laminate...can't be outside ...clearly will fail in the rain
customer_reviews.author: Tomas O' Grady

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money - Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used it to display art work - images on magnets and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: dr Frank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for menu posting!
customer_reviews.text: This will figure prominently in our newly remodeled kitchen. Our granddaughter loves to post menus and used to write them on paper and tape them to the cabinets. No more! Now there is a special spot for her to get creative. We plan to sand the frame and stain it to match the new cherry cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Great chalk board.  I ordered one to try and went back for another.
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived quickly and packed well. The chalk board has the "old school" chalk board feel, perfect for chalk. I have noticed some newer chalk boards opt for a rough plastic surface that is just too rough for smooth writing. No complaints so far. There are hooks that allow for hanging in the horizontal and vertical orientations.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Ly

customer_reviews.title: writes and cleans well
customer_reviews.text: This chalkboard is better than expected! It is solid quality, large enough to fill the wall over my couch, and writes on like butter! I bought the VersaChalk makers and cleaning kit — after having a design on the board for over a month, it cleaned off easily and almost spotlessly!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Five stars!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this purchase! Came well packaged with no damage. Nice size and the frame is good quality. I used liquid chalk markers and they worked awesome! Erasing the markers also was easy, just used a wet towel. I am very pleased with this chalkboard. Seems well made and works just as it should! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great & looks very nice hanging on my den wall. Had to use power drill to secure it to wall as attached 70+ travel magnets to it & became quite heavy. Sturdy & very well made. Happy with this quality product. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Adrie33

customer_reviews.title: Great Magnet Board
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2 year old to place magnets on. She has also discovered chalk so MORE USES. It's on the smaller size, but works well for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Jane N.

customer_reviews.title: Quality surface but frame damage and missing screws
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty excited to get a chalkboard since I tutor online from home. Opened and found that the wood frame was already coming undone, screws missing, top left corner unattached, and ringlet to hang it with missing. This was really disappointing especially since the surface itself seemed really high quality. Was torn on decision at first but had to return as a busted frame made it too hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: gc

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: The magnet board itself is not smooth. Has a few large bumps and creases in it. Not the best quality but it’s for my kids and it will serve its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Dianaj

customer_reviews.title: but it's fine for what I'm using it for
customer_reviews.text: It's actually smaller than what I wanted, but I didn't realize that until I actually hung it in the space. I'm ordering another one a size up and moving this to the kitchen. The frame's kind of cheap looking, but it's fine for what I'm using it for.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: This nice looking board fit my needs perfectly and I would ...
customer_reviews.text: This nice looking board fit my needs perfectly and I would have given it 5 stars except that the price was a bit high. Since I wanted to mount the board flush to the wall, I removed the hanging hardware and installed it with Velcro strips, which worked great. I haven't written on this board with chalk because I bought it to use with a dry erase magnetic sheet that I cut into squares so I could make a memo board for my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Son of Publius

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to display the magnets I buy when I travel. The fridge was not working and sometimes they would fall off. Now they are displayed in a perfect spot and are very secure. I love it and as I travel more I may need another!
customer_reviews.author: snowwhite

customer_reviews.title: Best for chalk pens!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I thought it would be. I use the liquid to dry chalk pens on this and they wipe away with ease. I am really happy with this board!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Great board, but we are seeing problems 6 months in : (
customer_reviews.text: When we first received the board, it was perfect. Not the slate we ultimately want, but this seemed like a good substitute. However, 6 months in, the sides of the chalkboard surface is bubbling up : ( Hopefully, it doesn't keep peeling back.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I got this to display magnets from my travels. It looks very nice and works great for the magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to show off some photographs and it is awesome. I'm using it is a magnet board and it really makes the pictures pop and it looks great in my kitchen. Very happy with it. I bought the largest size.
customer_reviews.author: Lovebooks

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: When I got the product it was damaged in several places. The black portion Doesn’t seem very sturdy so I’m returning. Was hoping the wood would have been a bit darker as well for that rustic feel.
customer_reviews.author: Qiana

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Chalkboard is bubbling up all over! Frame is nicked and splinting...in fact, actually gave me a splinter!!
customer_reviews.author: SIR

customer_reviews.title: very nice blackboard. Cleans with no ghosting seems to be ...
customer_reviews.text: very nice blackboard. Cleans with no ghosting seems to be well made. Only small complaint is there are three hanging hooks which makes it hang a little lopsided so I just removed the one I didnt need.That is a very small prob though.
customer_reviews.author: Tomats

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality board, smooth surface and the frame is also really nice I bought a second one
customer_reviews.author: Bella Lugo

customer_reviews.title: As expected. Small
customer_reviews.text: It worked well like any chalk board but was difficult to hang and quite small. Can’t really use it for homeschooling or anything, although it is magnetic.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Frame damaged
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this, after much research. The frame was damaged in several places, so I returned it - cannot justify having paid $60 and having to look at a banged-up frame for years to come. Ordering another one, hoping for a better packaging job.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Came slightly warped. No indication of metal; must ...
customer_reviews.text: Came slightly warped. No indication of metal; must be very thin and sandwiched between a black vinyl surface on the front and a pressed paper board backing. Magnets stick, but not to the degree that I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her office. Added some magnets and photos. She loved it. Came packaged very well. it can be hung horizontally or vertically. The frame is wood and quite sturdy. I was very pleased with the value and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Selmer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you expect!
customer_reviews.text: Cute chalkboard, nice wood trim, good value for money, works well with liquid chalk markers.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: It looks great but like many other reviewers said the product came ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks great but like many other reviewers said the product came damaged slighly at the corner. It's not enough for me to go through the hassle of returning but there's nothing worse then purchasing something at a full price and receiving it damaged. Please work better packaging your merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: Helen C.

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, it's what I was looking for. I bought it to accommodate my collection of magnets and place 62 of them. It is quite resistant and looks very good. I plan to buy another one of them soon. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Bauza

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I bought this board to display our collection of magnets from traveling. The board is perfect. I under estimated my collection so I bought another, I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: KateZ

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find size. Love that it’s magnetic. Wish they had it in green
customer_reviews.author: C.Kop.82

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Works well and looks great. Has minor imperfection where wood is damaged but not a big enough deal to go through the hassle of returning it and buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, looks nice, I don't relocate it much, it just sits there with bunch of manets, works for that purpose with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised by how good the board is. Almost spotless. While packing wasn't great, the styrofoam protected the board inside.
customer_reviews.author: Sporadic Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not $50 good!
customer_reviews.text: I actually really like this thing, but for the price.... it’s not that great! It’s a fairly cheap product, if I could have seen it before I bought it I would have never paid $50 for it. $25 tops.
customer_reviews.author: gardengirl

customer_reviews.title: Rustic chalk Board
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking forward to making my daughter's sign for her wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Kaneshiro

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this board for our homeschool, which is in our dining room, so I wanted to avoid the look of a dry erase board. I love it! The frame of my board was very slightly warped. Not noticeable, but still irritating to spend this much money and have it arrive in less than perfect condition. I only wish Injad gotten a bigger one!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Using this at work and it is the perfect size! It looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: This chalkboard is a great deal for the price. NIcely made, and chalk goes on smooth as silk. Magnets stick well. Exactly what I hoped for. I'd love to see this item made in a larger size!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Limestone

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about other reviews
customer_reviews.text: Ours feels and looks like a vintage blackboard from a classroom on a much smaller scale
customer_reviews.author: Mr Shua

customer_reviews.title: Great display board
customer_reviews.text: I liked it so much I bought a second. I hung them in my craft room to display my travel magnets near my world map. The light weight makes them easy to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy A Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I was really excited about this board. Mine arrived damaged with scratches, rust and warped.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun!
customer_reviews.text: We use this for special event countdowns (birthdays, etc) so the kids write on it almost daily. Has held up well for the 3 months we’ve had it.
customer_reviews.author: TeacherTreasures

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought my mom this for Christmas along with some Crafty Crock liquid chalk pens. She says they wipe off this board easily. The board itself is well made and can be hung either vertically or horizontally with the included hangers. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: richieoTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I simply love this chalkboard!
customer_reviews.text: I simply love this chalkboard! It is so black and my liquid chalk markers show up so well on this background.
customer_reviews.author: Jayloja

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: We mounted it on a kitchen wall and my wife loves it. It went up very easily. The metal board allows her to stick asst items on it with magnets and it takes chalk very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M

customer_reviews.title: Great for displays of magnets!
customer_reviews.text: The size was perfect for my need of displaying magnets at craft shows. It doesn't stand on its own so I use a table top easel. the board itself looks very nice and displays magnets well.
customer_reviews.author: ll

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I wanted - no more - no less. Exactly what is described.
customer_reviews.author: amanda neilson

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love It!
customer_reviews.text: The kids in our hoa love it. We put a tray with magnetic animals in it for the kids to put on the board.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R

customer_reviews.title: Love this liquid chalk
customer_reviews.text: Love this liquid chalk! I had no problems with it! I’ll definitely buy again! I bought these to do the sign for my dog’s Quinceanara party :) (she’s our first born...ha!)
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Burchett

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: This was EXACTLY what we wanted for our wedding. It came on time, not broken, and was easy to write on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is nice and sturdy, old quality and perfect for what I was wanting to do. Not too heavy. Magnets stick too it very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! But mine had to be hung vertically...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and well made! Only downside is loops for hanging were permanently installed so I had to hang vertically. Someone more handy could probably modify this though...
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: As pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent size for family calendar. We bought two. One for family rules and another for a monthly calendar. Chalk markers work great on these.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan I

customer_reviews.title: Get the chalk pens when you order just to save a trip to 5 stores to find them
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome, I got the 2x3' and hung it vertical for show numbers and projections for catering gigs and it's great erases cleanly with water and no ghosting as of yet had it less than a weeks and have erased it about 30 times now and always clean.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: It's just perfect~ the chalk colors go on beautifully and look bright. It wipes clean with a damp cloth leaving no residue. It was well packed and arrived quickly. I bought the middle size. I'm glad I ordered this chalk board..
customer_reviews.author: KSD

customer_reviews.title: My board needs are met
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I needed it to do. Very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: r2

customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. It's definitely worth it to spend a little more on a magnetic chalkboard. It's an awesome message center for our home and it looks really nice too. The wood is this lovely, dark, deep color. It seems to be way more expensive than it actually is. I put string lights around it and got some cute magnets - definitely happy with my purchase and with the delivery
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. This was my second one after returning the first one that came damaged. But it’s great now and looks really good. Very sturdy. Love that it’s magnetic too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The board and frame would have been perfect for what I needed, but it arrived with scratches and an area where the surface is actually chipping off. I tried wiping it to see if it was just superficial imperfections. Unfortunately, the answer is no. Super disappointed. I really wanted this to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and good quailty.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chalkboard as a potential prototype for use at work. It was great! Good quality, easy and smooth to write on with paint markers. I purchased 7 more boards. Very Affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Leonor Isabel

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for me and my daughter. I hung in kitchen to write notes to my daughter reminders when I leave the home. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ayesha

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: So cute for my toddler's magnet board. I'll probably purchase another one for chalk in the garage during winter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hang horizontally
customer_reviews.text: This looked to be a great chalkboard, but it didn't come equipped to be hung horizontally. We returned it for another chalkboard.
customer_reviews.author: VijayPendakur

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and hang
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my chore list and was easy to hang and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Large Chalk Boards with Frame by VersaChalk (24x36" Industrial, Porcelain) Framed Chalkboard Sign for Business, Bistro Bar, Sandwich Menu, Sidewalk, Signage Classroom, Wedding
feature_bullets: CLASSROOM QUALITY: Incredibly durable and built with teacher-approved quality to last for years of constant use. The thin, natural wood chalkboard frame maximizes usable space for lettering, menus, to-do lists, chore charts, reminders, and more!

RUSTIC PINE WOODEN FRAME: Sturdy, solid wood frame (not veneer) is stained to a beautiful, vintage golden oak color to perfectly match farmhouse decor. Ideal small chalkboard signs for your kitchen, wall, kids' rooms, living room, café menu, or business.

HANG IT IN SECONDS: Our hanging chalkboard sign is quick and easy to install on your wall- vertically or horizontally, without any additional effort using the pre-installed wall mounts. No screwdriver necessary!

DOUBLE SIDED MAGNETIC CHALKBOARD: Stick magnet on the porcelain chalkboard surface to hang pictures, reminders, notes, and travel souvenirs. Fun and functional – this chalkboard with frame is the perfect choice!

NO CHALK STAINS: For use with chalk ink markers or regular chalk, the commercial quality, non-porous porcelain steel blackboard surface resists scratches, stains, and damage. Wipes clean in seconds with a damp cloth or VersaChalk chalkboard cleaner. Guaranteed never to ghost or stain when used with VersaChalk liquid chalk markers.
